name: Historic Sacrifice - Unfinished
description:
UNFINISHED

Currently the game is missing the dialogue and member list features. This makes it random to guess who is the chosen one, but I might finish the game in the future. Also some of the fonts and the shapes of the masks were sourced online.

This is a game about preventing the end of the world by sacrificing a member of an ancient cult.  A random member is chosen and you have to identify the this member based on the information you get from them.  Each member is  a historical figure and their details are listed in the member list.  Pick the right cultist and you save the world, get it wrong and the world goes bye. 

This was a solo project done for the Portsmouth Uni GameJam 2022.
